posts.post_content:
I have 2 very nice T3's.  A PSA 4.5 Brown $1900obo a very strong card.  The card was sold, but the buyer had to back out of the deal due to familyhealth issues.  

I'm looking for 33 goudey PSA 5 #53 Ruth, #92 Gehrig, #181 Ruth, and #223 Dean. I would also be willing to entertain other trades.

I'm sure there would be cash involved to get a trade done.

If you'd like to buy the cards,  you can also e-mail me at [url]incugator@Hotmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a376/incugator/T3Brown.jpg[/IMG]

-Ryan

posts.post_title: T3 Wallace Sold T3 Brown still available

posts.post_content:
I'm still looking for the trades, but I put up a price.  The only other PSA 4.5 to sell went for $2400.  This is a great price.

-Ryan
Card is stil available.  E-mail me if you are interested.

The buyer of the T3 Brown is an outstanding member of the boards and sadly had to back out of the deal due to family health issues.  Luckily everybody is okay.  

I am putting the Brown back up for sale at $1900obo.

I have no idea of what the situation is .... but it's so nice to see someone handle a difficult scenario with class.

Best Regards,
Scott
